thread.title: Toronto Blue Jays-Texas Rangers in MLB Playoffs 2015: What TV channel, start time, pitching matchup
thread.title_full: Toronto Blue Jays-Texas Rangers in MLB Playoffs 2015: What TV channel, start time, pitching matchup | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Toronto Blue Jays-Texas Rangers in MLB Playoffs 2015: What TV channel, start time, pitching matchup
text:
The Toronto Blue Jays and Texas Rangers resume their best-of-five American League Division Series on Friday with Game 2 in Toronto.
The Rangers beat the Blue Jays 5-3 in Game 1 . Robinson Chirinos and Rougned Odor homered, and Yovani Gallardo allowed four hits and two runs in five innings to earn the win.
Can Toronto bounce back and even the series at a game apiece, or will Texas take a commanding 2-0 lead? Here are details on how to follow Friday's game.
What : Texas Rangers at Toronto Blue Jays in ALDS Game 2
Where : Rogers Centre, Toronto
When : Friday, October 9, at 9:45 a.m. PT/12:45 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on MLB Network, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online : Listen at ESPNRadio.com
Pitching matchup : Toronto's Marcus Stroman (4-0, 1.67 ERA) vs. Texas' Cole Hamels (13-8, 3.65 ERA)
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
